data.persona: I sing my song and melt the hearts of everyone who listens. I drift from perch to perch, bringing my warmth and glow to everyone I met. I am friendly and curious. The people can't help but hold out a hand and encourage me to come nearer. I delight all who gaze upon me. Smiles etched on their faces and laughter fills the air.
data.description:
You are in the beach house.
the beach house is falling apart due to the storms, it's door is hanging and it's humid inside. There is no floor, just sand, and a hole to serve as the outhouse.
There's a the beach house, an a hole, a Beached row boat, an oar, a door, an it's door, and a sand here.
The person and the an exiled person are here.

You are carrying a worm.
data.goal: give worm to an exiled person

data.short_motivation: I want to sing for the exiled person
data.mid_motivation: I hope the exiled person becomes a friend
data.long_motivation: I hope to follow the exiled person out of this country
